    • Field Detail

    • Method Detail

      • doGetAll

        java.lang.Object doGetAll(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        This method will select all Session of a given subject of parameter request
        There are two kind of requests. One is sent by teacher user and the other is sent by student user
        Teacher user request will receive all sessions created by him
        Student user request will receive all sessions invited
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.GET_ALL_SESSION
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains :
        • SessionDAO.SUBJECT_ID UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        Session.toJSON() array if subject has session. Otherwise, returning an empty array

      • doView

        java.lang.Object doView(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Get a Session that has the same sessionID in parameter request
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.VIEW_QUESTION
        Parameters:
        parameters - request parameter map contains
        SessionDAO.ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        Session.toJSON() if session is found otherwise, returning an empty array

      • doActive

        java.lang.Object doActive(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Change the status of given session to active and update the changes to session table
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains :
        • SessionDAO.ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception
        Otherwise, @return failure message
        this method is called when receiving URIRequest.ACTIVE_SESSION

      • doAccept

        java.lang.Object doAccept(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Change status of Session to accepted and set the changes to session table
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains: UserDAO.USER_KEY
        SessionDAO.ID
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception
        Otherwise, @return failure message
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.ACCEPT_SESSION

      • doDelete

        java.lang.Object doDelete(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Change delete_indicator of user with the session from o to 1
        That means this session becomes invisible with user
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains :
        • SessionUserDAO.SESSION_ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception. Otherwise

      • doCreate

        java.lang.Object doCreate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Create a new Session object from values of parameter request
        Add new Session to session table
        Add a new SessionUser record to session_user table
        Add two questions:excited and difficult to calculate real time statistics
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains
        • SessionDAO.CREATION_DATE
        SessionDAO.IS_ACTIVE
        SessionDAO.NAME
        SessionDAO.SUBJECT_ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception.
        Otherwise, @return a failure message
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.CREATE_SESSION

      • doInActive

        java.lang.Object doInActive(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Change the status of the give session to inactive
        Set the change to session table
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        • SessionDAO.ID UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception.
        Otherwise, @return a failure message
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.INACTIVE_SESSION

      • doUpdate

        java.lang.Object doUpdate(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Change name of session from parameter request and set the change to session table
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains
        • SessionDAO.NAME
        SessionDAO.ID
        UserDAO.USER_KEY
        Returns:
        success message if there is no exception.
        Otherwise, @return a failure message
        this method is called when receiving URIRequest.UPDATE_SESSION

      • doGetStudentsOfSession

        java.lang.Object doGetStudentsOfSession(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> parameters)
        Select all student User that invite to the given Session
        Parameters:
        parameters - contains:
        • UserDAO.USER_KEY
        SessionUserDAO.ACCEPT_SESSION
        SessionUserDAO.SESSION_ID
        Returns:
        User.toJSON() array if session has user. Otherwise, returning an empty array
        This method is called when receiving URIRequest.GET_ALL_STUDENT
